author: sarowe
msg: Ignore this test under IntelliJ, which can't use Ant's test file patterns (Test*.java,*Test.java) to ignore this test, and thinks it's a failure since no test methods can be found.

author: niallp
msg: Change the visibility of the *utility* methods from private to package (so that the XmlStreamReaderUtilitiesTest can also be run against the "compatibility" version of XmlStreamReader)

author: sarowe
msg: Ignore this test under IntelliJ, which can't use Ant's test file patterns (Test*.java,*Test.java) to ignore this test, and thinks it's a failure since no test methods can be found.

author: sebb
msg: Fix up OpenVMS implementation to use symbols rather than logicals.
Seems more in keeping with other OSes, and environment updates work better.
